fields.name: Moonlight (Day):
fields.value:
Haul a player off to jail, they will believe to have been jailed by a Jailor.
Eliminate (Night): Execute your prisoned player, this may be done night one. 2 uses.
Moon Pressure (Night): Immediately learn your targetâ€™s role. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Roleblock, control, conversion immune.
Does not attend the nightly Umbrae meeting.
